about_the_game:
Updated 06/24 - The Game is ALIVE AND KICKING. Is undergoing a major rework in order to fulfill its promeses.

Mechanical Gods is a 3D Arena Fighting game. Choose your favourite fighter and test your skills against powerful AIs and players alike, hitting, slashing, dashing and kicking your way through every arena. Each fight you survive gets you closer to unveil the secrets of the Mechanical Gods.

FIGHT FOR SURVIVAL



Use your best strategy and powerful moves to survive through conutless battles. Don't charge your opponents ruthlessly, if your stamina goes to zero, so will do your chances of victory.

Beyond basic attacks, You have at your disposal many tricks to secure your life:

- Dashing to avoid attacks and put some ground between You and your enemy.
- Consumable items to recover your health or to pressure your opponent's defenses, like granades and ground mines.
- Long ranged weapons to sting the enemies from the distance.
- Special moves with different effects, ranges and purposes.
- Kicking and pushing your enemies out of the arena to kill them out of nowhere...
- Satisfying special moves that could turn the fight in your favour while releasing all your energy!

PICK THE CHALLENGE RIGHT FOR YOU

Like in classical fighting games, You can choose among popular different modes like:

- Story mode. Every fight has a meaning. At the end of the journey you'll know what lies behind the curtain.
- Arcade mode. Fight once against a finite number of opponents to claim the title of champion, without worrying about running out of resources!
- Time Attack mode. Close every match as soon as possible and share your best result with your friends or challenge yourself to do even better.
- Survival mode. Your enemies are endless like your will to go on. How many can you defeat before running out of items, energy and willpower?
- PvP modes. Both online or offline with a friend, test your skill against some human player if you feel really competitve!
- Training mode. If you're not ready to test the blade, don't worry, there's always a safe place to figure things out without pressure...

A DARK FUTURE


Mechanical Gods is set in a distant future where humanity is no more than a tiny gear in a much bigger mechanism. In a reality of death and oppression lead by invisible AIs, humans fight against robots in a never ending tournament, trying to survive, Champion after Champion. Will You be the greatest of them all?

content_descriptors.notes: In Mechanical Gods is not present any sexual content or bad language, but as a fighting game, a certain tolerance to depiction of physical violence, death and use of weapons is needed. In this videogame is present frequent blood (although stylized), which is necessary to convey the right game feel and the general mood of the story.

  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1050
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card
